intro_science_title: Ebya saayansi bikyaanise. Ebiseera byo mumaaso teulina.
intro_climate_emergency_moral_duty: Twina obuvunaanyizibwa okubitereeza - newankubadde mu mbeera ye byo bufuzzi byafee.
intro_description_climate_emergency: Obulamu kunsi buli mukatabagano. Obutende buchuuse mangu mangu nokukira abana sayaansi abakuggu bwebabigerageranya kati bigenze walaanyo. Obutonde buffudee bwona. Ebirime biffa. Enkungaana ne byobuwangwa byona bisaanyeewo. Byona biffudde. Tuli mu biseera bya yiriyiri, gavumentizaffe zigaanye ku baako ne kyezikola ko. Extinction Rebellion yatondebwaawo ku bitereeza.
seo_description_group: Byona ebigenda okubaawo, amawulire ne ebyawamu woona kulwa XR {group}, bichusibwa buli lunaku. Weyunge ku Extinction Rebellion {group} mu bikoosi byoyaggala, offune mu ekiffo mu kibbiina!
seo_description_training: Yiga kulwaaki twolekedde ukasaanyzibwaawo okwensi yona nukubaako nekyokozeeko. We wandiise ofunne okutendekebwa muwakashopu osobole okweyunga ku kibiina!
seo_description_groups: We yunge ku kikoosi kya Extinction Rebellion ekikuli okumpi, offune ebifaayo, ebigendamomaaso, na amawulire agagwirawo; bulilunaku munsi yonna. Weyunge ku kikoosi kya XR ekikuli okumpi naawe obeere ku kwekalakaasa!
seo_description_donate: Oyambe okukulakulanya Tanganyika yaffe, wagira 1100+ mu kikoosi kya XR munsi yonna, kulwaanyisa embeera ne obutonde obutabaganyie mubiseera bino ebibi.
seo_title_groups: We yunge ku kikosi kyo ekya XR
seo_description_news: Ku Ensaanyaawo Tugigaanye mu bumpi mpi. Tukuyamba okusigala anga omaanyi ebyomugaso ebikwatagana ku nchuuka no obuwangwa mubugwiirawo ne mirimu emirala gyetwenyigirramu.
seo_title_news: Amawulire Ge Ebyobutonde Ne Nchuuka chuuka yo budde
seo_description_get_involved: Tukwetaaga - yona eyo gyooli, akaseera koona kosobola okutuwa - tuzimbe enkwatagana engumu to chuuse ekubbo lye tulimu nga obudde bukyaali.
seo_description_about_us: Yiga enkola ya XR ne ntandika ya ffe, enono zaffe kyeki, bye twagala gavumenti zaffe zitukolere. Tweyungeko mulutalo lwffe tulwanyise enchuka chuka ye obutonde ,embera yo budde ne bitonde byona.
seo_description_why_rebel: Yiga ebyo buwangwa bwensi , embeera ne obutonde mubugwiirawo mu kuwa amaanyi abekalakaasi kweewaayo mububi ne mubulungi olweembeera enunji mumaaso.
rebel_body_subheader_2: Enchuuka chuuka yensi no obunji bwa kaboni
rebel_body_description_1_overflow_1_quot: Ebikolwa bino bireeta endwadde nga bisasaaya awamu mu bantu bangi nokulwanagana ne bisolo, ate nga 70% endwadde ezikwata abantu mweziva...okubonabona kwabantu okutamanyidwa ebyenfuna na abatuuze ku nsi yonna. Gwe mukono gwo muntu mu enfubutuuka yendwadde. Ate[Covid-19] yandiba nga katandika butandisi.
rebel_body_description_1_overflow_1: Tutunlidde okufiirwakwa [kayungirizi], butereevu olwebikolwa bya bantu' kubaawo, enffuna eyokwoonona, ne enkozesa eyitiride. Taata we ebyobutonde byona' E.O. Wilson agerageranyaamu okufiirwa ebitonde 27 ,000 buli mwaaka, oba kitonde kimu mubuli dakika 19 - benyini ababaliraramu kibiina kya mawanga gona amaggate ekya United Nations kubyobutteonde kibala 150 bulilunaku. Engeri yobutonde jebukolamu nebirala anga ensiyona - ekitundu ekimu bwekikosebwa, kisobola kukosa byonna, kwolekera buliwamu nga ekintu kimu awamu. Okutema emiti katitwonoonye obusobozi bwensi yona oku ziiyiza kaboni; ukujja ebikozesebwa ne birime mu nsi byonoonye ekiffo kyobutonde kinene; endwadde ne ebitonde ebirala biri mukusubulizibwa mu makubo amakyaamu; nenkozesa embi ebisaanyiizaawo.{wumula}{wumula}Nga bwetweyongera okwoonona obutonde munsi - Ensi ne bigikuuma - twolekede okufunna endwadde okuva ku bitonde ebirala, ekija okuvaako endwadde ezigwiirawo okweyongera nga Covid-19.
rebel_body_description_1: Ffena twawuliddeko - Ensi yeyongedde okwokya, obunji bwa kaboni bweyongedde, ate tuli mumakati gokugwerekerera ffena . Tutunulidde ebintu byamirundi ebiri byetulina okuloowozaako - ebyobutonde okugwaawo ne mbera yo budde eya chuuka. Byombi byolekedde ekiseera kizibu si kuffe abantu ffeka, naye ne ebitonde ebirala ogatteko nebiri munsi ne kunsi ebirala byona.
rebel_description_3: ...ate anga mubuli katyabaga kalimu ekisobola okuchuusibwamu.
rebel_description_2: Kino ekikangabwa tekimayi nsalo, gwanga oba amawanga, ate wadde obuggaga butaasaako, bya kaseera katoono. Esaawa eri ku katikitiki, ate bwetutawangula mukweyungira awamu kutaasa ensi yaffe, buli omu aja kukosebwa-gwe, abantu bo, buli omu nabulikyewekoledde mukwaanoâ€¦
rebel_description_1: Tuli wakati ke mbera ne byo buwangwa okugwerekerera. Twolekedde ebiseera ebibi nyo - ensiyaffe eri mukatyabaga no mulamu bwoka buli kubunkenke. Kino sikye ekiseera ekyo kutunula butunuzi ebintu bunno ; esaawa yeeno eya ddala. Ebyasayansi bitangavu. Tulimumakati ga kusanyizibwaawo okwaddala kwetwekoledde ne gavumenti zaffe ezitalinazekikolaawo kutaasa abataka baazo, ebitonde byaffe, ebyoobuwangwa, ensiyaaffe , ne ebiseera byaffe ebijja mumaaso eyo.
intro_description_news: Mubyetusasanya nga ebikolwa ebya Extinction Rebellion mu nsi yonna ku terreza embera eno echuuse mu mawulire ne ebigenda okubaawo, emboozi za Extinction Rebellion ze zijja okukuwereza ebiriwo mukulwanyisa amawanga gonna kufunna enchuuka chuuka.
intro_description_act_now: Obukodyo obwekiwangwa nga okusaako emikono, kukuyega, kulonda no kwe kalakaasa tebikoze olwaaamaanyi gokwagala enyo ebyoobufuzzi ne byenfunna. Enkola yaffe eno si ya bukambwe, kwoonoona no kutaakanya - so kuyekeera kutekawo enchuka chuka, kubanga byona ebirala bigaanye.
intro_description_global: Weyunge ku nsiyona mukulwanyisa kwaffe neebyo obufuzzi ebitaliko kugabanyizibwaamu munkozessa yaffe etali yakulwannaye eyo obutereevu no kujjukiza gavumenti zaffe kuzukuka no okubaako kyezikola ku mbeera eriwo eyobuwangwa ne bitonde ebiri kubunkenke.
intro_description_science: Tuli mukusanyizibwaawo no kugwerekera okwe nsi yonna. Obulamu ku nsi bugwaawo, abakugu mubyobutonde bakiiriza anti tuli mukaseera ake embera yensi nebyobutonde okusanyizibwaawo. Omuliro gwo luyiira no omusana omunji enyo, olukalu okuyitirira namazi ago munyanja okwambuka wagulu, ebiragirawo mu butafayo bwaffe bugenda kweyongera, nga tetukyasobola kutaasa embera eno embi.
seo_description_home: Obulamu anga bwetumanyi bugwaawo. Gavumenti zaffe ziremeddwa okututaasa. Tuyambe okuzimba enkwatagana engumu tusobole okuchyusaamu.
seo_title_home: Weyunge kulutalo olwokulwanyisa emberayo budde no kuzikira kwobutonde
rebel_body_description_1_overflow_3: Buli myeka kumi mu mirundi 4 egiyise gibbadde gyokya nyo emabaega, ate nga emyaka 5 egiwedde gyoka gye gimanydwaa mu biwandike. Enchuka chuuka ya budde kye kimu ku byononyedwa
rebel_body_description_1_overflow_2: okugwerekerera kwe ebitonde kuyitiridde nyo - ebyendya byaffe, ebyenfuna, okudda obujja mu mbeera yo obbudde embi. Okuva ku asipirini ku ndwadde zonna okutuusa mu kujjanjaba endwadde ya kokolo, nokukira 50% ku malagala agakozesebwa mu malwaliro {omukutu}, naabanasayansi okugumiiza amalagala amayitirivu agatanaba kuzulibwa agatulinzze mu byo bu tondde mu Amazoniya ne mu nsiko zebugwanjuba mu Asia. Mukwonona ebitonde; tweyoneneraebiseera byaffe ebyomumaaso.
